summary: FOR OVER A YEAR, I HAVE RECEIVED MULTIPLE NOTICES STATING A SAFETY RECALL FOR MY 2004 JEEP GR CHEROKEE...REFER TO R06 / NHTSA 15V-046 (AIRBAG SYSTEM OCCUPANT RESTRAINT CONTROL).   EVERY TIME I CONTACT MY LOCAL DEALER, THEY TELL ME THE PART IS NOT AVAILABLE...I NOW HAVE NO FAITH THAT THIS WILL EVER BE RESOLVED.  HELP!
